info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 6 at 11:21AM EDT until September 6 at 1:15PM EDT by NWS Key West FL
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...A portion of the Lower Keys.
* WHEN...Until 115 PM EDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Overflowing poor drainage areas.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1120 AM EDT, National Weather Service Meteorologist detected heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1.5 to 2.5 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Key West, Boca Chica, Key Haven and Fleming Key. - This includes US 1 between mile markers 0 and 5. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Do not drive your vehicle into areas where the water covers the roadway. The water depth may be too great to allow your car to cross safely.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON
